description: The Suminagashi Japanese Maple (Acer palmatum 'Suminagashi') is an amazing plant that has a unique and exquisite beauty unlike any other plant. Its striking purple, white and yellow-green foliage has a wonderful color pattern that stands out from the crowd. With interesting cloud-like limbs and leaf formation, this maple has a whimsical and graceful focal point for any garden or landscape. It's low-maintenance, drought-tolerant and very hardy, making it ideal for any sized yard. This majestic tree will become an instant conversation piece, adding both color and texture to your garden.
